fields.name: Booty Band
fields.description: Add resistance to any workout, wherever you are. Our Booty Band helps you to take your leg and all you body to the next level, whether you can make it to the gym or not. Length: 38cm.

fields.name: Women's Power Leggings
fields.description: Power Leggings are built to last; durability benefits include enhanced coverage thanks to a higher-waisted fit and ergonomic fabric, plus reinforced, cover-stitched seams will ensure you're always supported during your workout. A subtle inner pocket to the rear means you'll always have somewhere to store your valuables. Finished off with contoured seams for a figure-enhancing look, they're sure to become a workout favourite. 88% Nylon 12% Elastane

fields.name: Metcon Women's Trainers
fields.description: Metcon refines stability and durability to stand up to the push and pull of serious strength training. Lightweight, responsive cushioning dials up the comfort during workouts that include lifting, high-intensity intervals-even sprints and short runs.

fields.name: Okimo Women's Road Running
fields.description: Okimo was built to help power through every mile of the race. Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.

fields.name: Women's Power Short Sleeve Crop Top
fields.description: Designed for a flattering fit, you'll breeze through training in the Power Short Sleeve Crop Top. Complete with sweat-wicking technology, itâ€™s a match for any workout, as the garment fibres are treated with a hydrophilic finish to wick away moisture while keeping the body cool and dry. 88% Nylon 12% Elastane

fields.name: Training Essentials RPM Rope
fields.description: The perfect tool to finally master those double unders. Whether you see yourself as a skipping pro, or see skipping as a good way to get in your daily cardio, we have you covered. With knurled stainless stell handles and axis rotation, nothing will get in the way of a high RPM.

fields.name: Fitness Dumbbells
fields.description: Ideal for circuit training style group exercise classes, individual high intensity interval training and cardiovascular endurance trainiing.

fields.name: Fitness Rubber Radial olympic Weight Discs
fields.description: These radial Olympic weigth plates have been designed specifically for performing a large variety of barbell exercises and exercises which take advantage of the gripping options during a gym workout.

fields.name: G7 Indoor Cycling Bike
fields.description: The G7 is a high-quality studio exercise bike. The G7 has a very sturdy and robust frame and can support users with a weight of up to 125kg. Engineered fro performance, the large 20kg flywheel provides a smooth road biking-like experience

fields.name: Yoga Recovery Mat
fields.description: Our Yoga Recovery Mat has been designed with high-density foam to ensure a comfortable practice wherever you are. Whether you're stretching after an evening run or taking on a morning flow, it's the ideal choice to keep you safe and supported. Dimensions: 183 x 61cm

fields.name: Yoga Recovery Mat and Dumbbells
fields.description: A mix of Yoga Recovery Mat and Dumbbells
